title: Israel's First Overt Attack on Iran
description: Israel conducts its first overt attack on Iran, targeting air defense systems and missile program sites

title: Iran Executes Alleged Mossad Agent
description: Iran executes a man it said worked for Israel's Mossad foreign intelligence agency

title: Conflict Timeline Analysis Published
description: The New York Times reports on the history of the conflict, noting the significance of the October 7 attacks as a catalyst

title: Israel Launches Strike Campaign
description: Israel launches a series of strikes against Iran, escalating the direct confrontation

title: Critical Infrastructure Targeted
description: Israel expands its strike campaign to include critical Iranian energy infrastructure
source: Institute for the Study of War

title: Iranian Missile Response
description: Iran fires two separate salvos of missiles and drones at Israel, with one striking the port city of Haifa

title: Fourth Day of Escalation
description: The conflict enters its fourth day with continued and broadened attacks from both sides. Iranian missile attacks on Israel kill 8

title: Ongoing Direct Military Exchange
description: Direct military exchange continues with Israel claiming aerial superiority over Tehran while Iran maintains missile attacks
